title: Fortunes and Geometric Means
summary:
I saw a post on X recently that said Bill Gates is closer to you in wealth than he is to Elon Musk. Mind blown. For round numbers, let’s say Elon Musk’s net worth is 800 billion and Bill Gates’ net worth is 100 billion. So if your net worth is less 450 billion, the […]
